sqlMap.insert: insert into business (bnum, bname, bpass, ceoname, btel, baddr, idbnum, bacc) values (busi_seq, #bname#, #bpass#, #ceoname#, #btel#, #baddr#, #idbnum#, #bacc#)
sqlMap.update: update business set bpass=#bpass#, bname=#bname#, ceoname=#ceoname#, btel=#btel#, baddr=#baddr#, bacc=#bacc#)
sqlMap.select: select * from business order by bnum
select bpass from business where idbnum=#idbnum#
select count(*) from investor where idmail=#idmail#
sqlMap.update: update reply set rname=#rname#,rcontent=#rcontent# where rnum=#rnum#
sqlMap.select: select rnum,rname,rcontent,rdate from reply order by rnum desc
select pnum,rname,rcontent from reply where rnum=#rnum#

select rnum,pnum,rname,rcontent,rdate from (select rnum,pnum,rname,rcontent,rdate,rownum rn from (select rnum,pnum,rname,rcontent,rdate from reply order by rnum desc) ) where rn between #start# and #end#

select pname,gmoney,cmoney,rate,deadline from (select pname,gmoney,cmoney,rate,deadline,rownum rn from (select pname,gmoney,cmoney,rate,deadline from funding order by pname desc) ) where rn between #start# and #end#

select pname,gmoney,cmoney,rate,deadline from (select pname,gmoney,cmoney,rate,deadline,rownum rn from (select pname,gmoney,cmoney,rate,deadline from funding where (sysdate-deadline) >= 0) ) where rn between #start# and #end#

select pname,gmoney,cmoney,rate,deadline from (select pname,gmoney,cmoney,rate,deadline,rownum rn from (select pname,gmoney,cmoney,rate,deadline from funding where (sysdate-deadline) < 0 and (sysdate-deadline) >= -1) ) where rn between #start# and #end#
select count(*) from funding where (sysdate-deadline) < 0 and (sysdate-deadline) >= -1

select pname,gmoney,cmoney,rate,deadline from (select pname,gmoney,cmoney,rate,deadline,rownum rn from (select pname,gmoney,cmoney,rate,deadline from funding where category=#category# ) where rn between #start# and #end#
select count(*) from funding where category=#category#
